japanese:
（よしっ！　ここの問題は完成だ。
　くくく、あいつらはこの引っかけに
　果たして気づけるかな？）
translation:
(Alright! This problem is finished.
 Heheh, I wonder if they'll notice this trap?)

japanese: （次は……ボーナス問題も入れておいてやるか！）
translation: (Next... I guess I'll include a bonus question too!)

japanese:
（自分たちの努力の成果を感じさせるのも、
　家庭教師としての義務だしな）
translation:
(Feeling the results of one's efforts
 is also the duty of a tutor, after all.)

japanese:
フッ、あいつらの喜ぶ顔が目に浮かぶようだ。
待ってろよ、明日までに夏の突発問題集を
完成させてやるからな！
translation:
Heh, I can almost see their happy faces.
Just wait, I'll finish these sneaky summer
self-made pop quizzes by tomorrow!

japanese: なつの……とっぱつ……もんだいしゅう？
translation: Sneaky...summer...self-made pop quizes?

japanese:
うおっ！？
らいは、いつの間に！
translation:
WOAH?!
Raiha, when did you get here?!

japanese:
ねえ、お兄ちゃん。
まさかとは思うけど、明日からも
みんなに勉強させるつもり？
translation:
Hey, big bro.
I hope you're not planning to make everyone
study again starting tomorrow, right?

japanese:
テストが終わったら、
みんなと遊ぶって約束だったよね。
translation:
You promised to enjoy yourself with everyone
once the tests were over.

japanese:
誰も明日からやるなんて言ってないだろ。
どうしてそう疑うんだ。
translation:
No one said anything about doing that
from tomorrow.
Why do you doubt me like that?

japanese: だって、お兄ちゃんだし。
translation: You ARE my big bro, ya know.

japanese: （そうですか……）
translation: (Is that so...)

japanese:
その問題集作りって、
家に帰ってからじゃダメなのかな？
translation:
Do you need to make your quizzes right now?
Can't you do it after we get home?

japanese:
そうすると問題集を始めるまで時間が空くだろ。
それこそ時間の浪費だ。
translation:
If I did that, too much time would pass
before they started the problems.
That would be a waste of time.

japanese: でも、今そういうことをするのはどうかと思うよ。
translation: But I don't think it's a good idea to do that right now.

japanese:
みんなが見たら、
またこれから勉強させられるのかーって
どんよりしちゃうもん。
translation:
If everyone sees the quizzes,
they'll feel like
they're going to be forced to study again.

japanese:
この島で過ごす残りの日くらいは
勉強を忘れさせてあげないと。
translation:
We should let them forget about studying
for the rest of the days we spend on this island.

japanese:
らいはの言いたいことはわかる。
しかしだ、夏を制する者が受験を制するという
言葉があるように――
translation:
I understand what you're saying, Raiha.
However, as they say, those who don't take
advantage of summer, fail the entrance exams%p-2;――

japanese: お兄ちゃん、ちょっとそこに座りなさい。
translation: Big bro, please sit over there for a moment.

japanese: え？　なんで？
translation: Yeah? Why?

japanese: いいから座りなさい。
translation: It's fine, sit down.

japanese: ……はい。
translation: ...Okay.

japanese: お兄ちゃんは、ちょっと周りが見えてなさすぎ。
translation:
Big bro,
you're not paying enough attention to your surroundings.

japanese: そ、そんなことはないだろ。
translation: Th-that's not true.

japanese: そんなことある！
translation: Yes, it is!

japanese:
だって、少しでも気が回るなら、
みんなが勉強を思い出すようなこと
絶対にしたりしないもん。
translation:
Because if you were even a little aware,
you wouldn't do something that would make everyone
remember studying again.

japanese: （そ、そうなのか？）
translation: (I-is that so?)

japanese:
今はまだいいけど、
そんなことばっかり続けてたら……。
translation:
Right now, it's okay,
but if you keep doing that kind of thing...

japanese:
これまで積み重ねてきた信頼が
崩れちゃうかもしれないんだよ？
translation:
The trust you've built up so far
might crumble, you know?

japanese: （信頼関係が崩れる……）
translation: (The trust might crumble...)

japanese:
確かにそれは困るな。
信頼関係がなくなったら、
これからの受験勉強に支障をきたしそうだ。
translation:
Indeed, that would be a problem.
If I lost their trust,
it could affect our future entrance exam studies.

japanese: はぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁ～～～～～～～……。
translation: *sigh*

japanese: な、なんだそのため息は……。
translation: Wh-what's with that sigh...

japanese:
ねえ、お兄ちゃんって、
みんなに勉強をさせるためだけに
信頼関係を作ってるの？
translation:
Look, big bro.
Are you building trust with everyone
just to make them study?

japanese:
（勉強をさせるためだけに……か。
　昔ならいざ知らず、今は……）
translation:
(Just to make them study...huh?
 Back then, maybe, but now...)

japanese: 違うでしょ？　違うよね？
translation: That's not it, right? It's not, is it?

japanese: そうだな、違うな。
translation: Yeah, you're right, it's not.

japanese: みんなもね、同じだと思うんだよ。
translation: I think everyone feels the same way too.

japanese:
損とか得とかそういうのはなしで、
お兄ちゃんを信頼してると思うんだ。
translation:
Forgetting about gain or loss or anything like that,
I think they trust you, big bro.

japanese: そ、そうか？
translation: R-really?

japanese:
でもお兄ちゃんは、
そんなみんなの信頼の上であぐらを掻いています！
translation:
But,
you're just resting on your laurels.
You're leaning too much on everyone's trust!

japanese: なんだって！？
translation: What?!

japanese:
だってそうでしょ。
みんなの想い、この島の生活の中で
お兄ちゃんに届いてるはずだよね。
translation:
But that's how it is, right?
Everyone's feelings should have reached you
in the midst of life on this island, big bro.

japanese: それなのに、気づかないふりをしてるよね？
translation: And yet, you're pretending not to notice, aren't you?

japanese:
（別に気づかないふりをしてるわけじゃない。
　だだ俺自身……自分の気持ちがわからない……）
translation:
(It's not like I'm pretending not to notice anything.
 I just...don't understand my own feelings...)

japanese: （とか言ったら、またらいはにどやされそうだ）
translation: (If I say that, Raiha will probably tease me again.)

japanese:
お兄ちゃん。
五月さんたちはとっても素敵な女の子なんだよ？
translation:
Big bro.
Itsuki-san and the others
are really wonderful girls, you know?

japanese:
ちゃんとしないと、あっという間に
誰かに取られちゃうんだから！
translation:
You have to act fast,
or else someone else might snatch them up in no time!

japanese: 想いは個人の自由だ。
translation: Feelings are a personal freedom.

japanese:
誰が誰を好きになろうと、
俺には……か、関係ないだろ。
translation:
Whoever likes whoever,
it's...n-none of my business.

japanese: 言ってることと顔が全然合ってないよ、お兄ちゃん。
translation:
What you're saying and how you look
don't match at all, big bro.

japanese: 俺は、あいつらの優しさに甘えていたんだろうか。
translation: Was I taking advantage of their kindness?

japanese: お兄ちゃん？
translation: Big bro?

japanese:
何度もぶつかってケンカをすることが多かったのに、
あいつらは、俺を見捨てずにつきあってくれたんだ。
translation:
Even though we fought and argued so many times,
they never abandoned me, and stayed by my side.

japanese:
そういうことが積み重なるうちに、
俺の中であいつらの優しさが当たり前のものに
なってしまったのかもしれない。
translation:
Over time, their kindness to me
may have become something that I took for granted.

japanese:
（それこそ、らいはの言うとおり、
　あいつらの信頼の上であぐらを掻いていたのかもな）
translation:
(Maybe, as Raiha said,
 I was just sitting on my laurels,
 relying on their trust.)

japanese:
そこまでわかってるなら、
やらなきゃいけないこともわかるよね？
translation:
If you understand that much,
then you should also understand
what you need to do, right?

japanese: あいつらは本気だ。
translation: They're serious.

japanese: えっ……。
translation: Huh...?

japanese:
だからこそ……
お、俺も、真剣にならなければならないと
思っている。
translation:
That's why...
I-I also think I have to get serious.

japanese: お兄ちゃん……。
translation: Big bro...

japanese:
し、しかしだ！　それと勉強とは別問題！
俺は、あいつらの将来のためにも
帰ったらすぐにこの問題集に取りかかれるように――
translation:
H-however! That's a separate issue from studying!
For the sake of their future, I need to start working
on these quizzes as soon as I get home%p-2;――

japanese: お兄ちゃん、相手の気持ちを、考えようね？
translation:
Big bro,
let's consider the feelings of the other party, okay?

japanese: はい、そうでした……。
translation: Okay, you're right...

japanese:
もう、みんなに対しても
勉強くらい積極的になれればいいのに。
translation:
Good grief, if only you could be more proactive
about the quintuplets than you are at studying.

japanese: （そんなこと言われても……）
translation: (Even if you say that...)

japanese:
とにかく！
お兄ちゃんは甘えすぎ！
あぐらを掻きすぎ！
translation:
Anyway!
You're too reliant on others, big bro!
You're too complacent!

japanese:
みんなに迷惑をかけた分、
これからは、お兄ちゃんから積極的にいかないと！
translation:
You have to be more proactive from now on
to make up for causing trouble for everyone!

japanese: はあ？　なんだって？
translation: Huh? What do you mean?

japanese: というわけで、私が一肌脱いであげる。
translation: So, I'll lend you a hand.

japanese:
えっ……？
何をするつもりなんだ？
translation:
Huh...?
What are you planning to do?

japanese:
お兄ちゃんには、これから
恋の特訓につきあってもらいます。
translation:
Big bro, you're going to accompany me
on love training from now on.

japanese: こ、恋のぉ！？
translation: L-LOVE TRAINING?!

japanese:
問答無用だよ。
これは、私からお兄ちゃんへのテストなんだからね！
translation:
No questions.
This is a test from me to you!

japanese: なに……テスト……だと。
translation: What... A test... You say?

japanese: そう、お兄ちゃんが大好きなテスト。
translation: Yes, the tests that you love so much, big bro.

japanese: （こ、これは冗談ではなさそうだ……）
translation: (Th-this doesn't seem like a joke...)

japanese: さて、まずは何をしてもらおうかなぁ。
translation: Now, what should I have you do first, I wonder.

japanese:
（……正直、不安すぎる。
　しかし、これはいい機会でもあるんだろうか）
translation:
(...To be honest, I'm really nervous.
 However, this could serve as a good opportunity.)

japanese:
（らいはの特訓とやらが、自分の気持ちを理解する
　何かのきっかけになるんだったら
　正直、助かりはする……）
translation:
(If Raiha's training can be a catalyst for
 me to understand my feelings,
 it would honestly be helpful...)

japanese:
……わかった。
らいはの言うとおりにする。
translation:
...Alright.
I'll do as you say, Raiha.

japanese: うん、じゃあ一緒に恋の特訓を始めるよ！
translation: Okay, then let's start your love training!
